local_intent: Perceive white_plate, compute top grasp, approach and align, execute Pick using white_plate_grasp, verify object in gripper.
assumptions: Camera has a clear view of white_plate
Gripper is calibrated and starts open
Robot reference frames initialized and collision-safe approach from above available
coherence_with_global: Implements the GLOBAL_BT grasp phase: detection, top-grasp computation, precise approach (0.005 tolerance), pick (1500ms timeout), and verification via ObjectInGripper. Includes retry for perception per recovery policy.
